articles.description: Max Healthcare Q1 earnings: CGHS price hikes for room rent and consultations in April, followed by an increase in tariffs for 36 radiological imaging investigations from June also lifted the hospital's topline.
articles.content:
Hospital major Max Healthcare Institute on August 7 reported a net profit of Rs 291 crore in the first quarter of the current fiscal, up 27 percent from Rs 229 crore in the year-ago period.
